org.pepstock.charba.client.items

Class LegendNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.BaseBoxItem
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.BaseBoxNodeItem
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.LegendNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsArea

    public final class LegendNode
extends BaseBoxNodeItem
    Wrapper of legend node of CHART.JS.
    This is a wrapper of legend node of Chart (of CHART.JS).
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LegendNode(ChartEnvelop<NativeObject> envelop)
      Creates the item using an envelop with the native java script object which contains all properties.
